channel.title: Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: adb常用命令
item.description: 打开原生launcher页面 1 adb shell am start -n com.android.launcher3/.Launcher 打开一般电视的原生设置 1 adb shell am start com.android.tv.settings/.MainSettings 查看可见的activity，最上层的activity 1 adb shell dumpsys activity |

item.title: 快速搭建SS
item.description: shell远程登录服务器 vultr服务器创建完毕 1 ssh root@自己的ip地址 获取安装脚本，并修改成可执行文件 1 2 wget –no-check-cer
